Name: Void Shard
Description: The stone is consumed by dark magic.

DescriptionLocalization.de: Der Stein wird von dunkler Magie verzehrt.
DescriptionLocalization.es: La piedra es consumida por la magia oscura.
DescriptionLocalization.fr: La pierre est consumée par la magie noire.
DescriptionLocalization.hu: A kőt a sötét mágia fogyasztja el.
DescriptionLocalization.it: La pietra è consumata dalla magia oscura.
DescriptionLocalization.ja: 石はダークマジックによって消費されます。
DescriptionLocalization.pt: A pedra é consumida pela magia negra.
DescriptionLocalization.zh: 石头被黑暗的魔法所消耗。
